title: How hard is it to find an IT tech job? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on your age and your skills and training. I was a network administrator for the company I worked for in addition to being a plant manager. I had a lot of skills and wanted to change jobs. But after 50 you can forget anybody hiring you. Skills and experience after 50 are meaningless. Employers figure they can hire a college graduate for half the price and train them to do the job they need done.
